MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyDictionary`2<class Microsoft.Build.Graph.ProjectGraphNode, class System.Collections.Immutable.ImmutableList`1<string>> GetTargetLists(class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<string> entryProjectTargets) cil managed
Public Function GetTargetLists (entryProjectTargets As ICollection(Of String)) As IReadOnlyDictionary(Of ProjectGraphNode, ImmutableList(Of String))

Docs.param: The target list for the . May be null or empty, in which case the entry projects' default targets will be used.
Docs.summary: Gets the target list to be executed for every project in the graph, given a particular target list for the entry project.
Docs.returns: A dictionary containing the target list for each node. If a node's target list is empty, then no targets were inferred for that node and it should get skipped during a graph based build.
Docs.remarks: This method uses the ProjectReferenceTargets items to determine the targets to run per node. The results can then be used to start building each project individually, assuming a given project is built after its references.

Docs.summary: Get an unordered collection of all project nodes in the graph.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ProjectNodesTopologicallySorted As IReadOnlyCollection(Of ProjectGraphNode)

Docs.summary: Get a topologically sorted collection of all project nodes in the graph. Referenced projects appear before the referencing projects.
